name: LILAC³
description:
✤ "Experience the many gifts of nature - the colors, the scents, the plants - and ascend into its tranquility. Counting petals, sky-gazing, breathing deep. Welcome all, to a new nature simulation: LILAC³."

✤ My entry for A Game By Its Cover Jam 2022 - inspired by my twin brother Nat King's submission for My Famicase 2022.

✤ UI Design by Nat King, everything else by Noah King.

✤ Controls: WASD or arrow keys to move.

After launching the game, please press F11 to enjoy the game in fullscreen.

Thank you for playing! ☆
